description.message: Adds one-click subscription to your toolbar.

default_title.description: Extension browser action tooltip text in manifest.

manage_option.description: The Manage label in the feed reader drop down.

feed_for.description: The label showing the feed name.

error_fetching.description: The error shown when feed fetching fails.

not_valid_feed.description: The error shown when validation of the feed fails.

no_entries.description: The error shown when the feed is empty.

one_entry_required.message: There must be at least one entry in this list
one_entry_required.description: The error shown when trying to remove the last item in the list.

remove_confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to remove $feed$
remove_confirmation.description: Confirmation message before removing a feed reader from the list.
